about.highlight: I am an experienced software developer and engineer with a persisting passion for discovery and achievement. Curiosity, ingenuity and reliability are my signature. Throughout my 14 years of professional experience I have learned to value inspiration and collaboration as the true pillars of productivity and fulfilment. My positive attitude, confidence and natural responsibility make me a valued  asset to every team.

journey.title: On a journey to new frontiers
journey.p1: Throughout my 8-year carrier as a civil engineer I was always fascinated by the impact of digitalization and how web applications changed the core activities within my field and everything around it.
journey.p2: Looking to optimize processes and increase the effectiveness of my team’s efforts, I searched for ways to extract the maximum of every application by exploring different scripts and APIs.
journey.p3: As time progressed and my curiosity increased, so did my desire to create applications of my own and cover areas of my field and everyday life which I felt could be improved with digital solutions.
journey.p4: In the past 4 years I have decided to pursue this desire fully by enlisting a developer program in a software academy, creating my first web application from the ground up and joining an agile Start-up team of likeminded developers who share my passion of exploring.
journey.p5: I am eager to continue this exciting journey and grow my skillset professionally, learn and create more applications that improve our quality of life.

education.title: Education
education.program: Software Engineering Program – JavaScript Web Developer
education.uasg: University of Architecture, Civil Engineering and Geodesy - Sofia, Bulgaria

info.p1: SoftUni's software engineering curriculum is a combination of programming courses depending on the specialization. It focuses on acquiring fundamental knowledge, practical skills and sufficient technical overview in latest software technologies - a must for every
info.p2: JavaScript Web Developer Program has three modules, each having a methodically selected sequence of courses, upgrading the IT competences in a well-considered pace, as follows:
info.li1: Entry Module - courses: Programming basics with C#, Programming basics with JAVA
info.li2: Fundamental Module - courses: Technology Fundamentals JavaScript
info.li3: Professional Module - courses: JS Essentials, JS Advanced, JS Applications, JS Backend, ReactJS, HTML & CSS and Frontend Frameworks.

js-backend.focus: practical skills for building Single Page Application & basic TypeScript

angular.focus: practical skills for building Single Page Application & basic TypeScript

css-advanced.focus: modern frontend design and development with animations and icons for adaptive display on devices with different screen sizes.

html-and-css.focus: practical skills in web development using HTML5 and CSS3 standard latest innovations.

js-applications.focus: practical skills for building well-structured Single Page Applications

js-advanced.focus: develops algorithmic thinking and practical skills for DOM tree manipulation and Unit testing.

js-fundamentals.focus: JS syntax and practical skills in manipulation with data types, operators, expressions, conditional constructions, loops and functions.

js-essentials.focus: basic techniques and tools for practical programming beyond the writing of simple program constructions.

scope.1: Basic syntax, conditional statements and loops
